executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Execute comprehensive end-to-end tests focusing on:
1. Authentication: Login with superadmin@demo.local (Super@12345) and owner@org1.local (Owner@12345), logout functionality, session persistence
2. RBAC: Test super_admin access to /admin routes, regular user blocked from admin routes, viewer read-only access, owner full organization access
3. Navigation: Test dashboard navigation for both super admin and regular users, sidebar menu functionality
4. Error Handling: Test unauthorized access handling, protected route redirects, invalid route handling

Generate detailed screenshots for each test step and comprehensive logs. Ensure all tests are executed and results are documented.
